001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.retry;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.DbQuery;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.QueryResponse;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.service.DatabaseService;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.retry.RetryCondition;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.retry.RetryConditionImpl;
008import java.util.function.Predicate;
009
010/**
011 * Provides retry conditions for database queries.
012 *
013 * <p>This class defines conditions for retrying operations based on database query results,
014 * allowing tests to wait until expected data is available.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018public class RetryConditionDb {
019
020   private RetryConditionDb() {
021   }
022
023   /**
024    * Creates a retry condition that waits until a query returns at least one row.
025    *
026    * <p>This condition is useful for ensuring that data has been inserted before proceeding
027    * with further test steps.
028    *
029    * @param query The database query to execute.
030    * @return A {@code RetryCondition} that evaluates to {@code true} when the query returns rows.
031    */
032   public static RetryCondition<Boolean> queryReturnsRows(DbQuery<?> query) {
033      return new RetryConditionImpl<>(
034            service -> {
035               DatabaseService databaseService = (DatabaseService) service;
036               QueryResponse queryResponse = databaseService.query(query);
037               return !queryResponse.getRows().isEmpty();
038            }, Predicate.isEqual(true)
039      );
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Creates a retry condition that waits until a specific field in the query result matches a value.
044    *
045    * <p>This condition is useful for waiting until a database update or insertion has propagated.
046    *
047    * @param query    The database query to execute.
048    * @param jsonPath The JSONPath expression to extract the value from the query result.
049    * @param value    The expected value to match.
050    * @return A {@code RetryCondition} that evaluates to {@code true} when the field matches the expected value.
051    */
052   public static RetryCondition<Object> queryReturnsValueForField(DbQuery<?> query, String jsonPath, Object value) {
053      return new RetryConditionImpl<>(
054            service -> {
055               DatabaseService databaseService = (DatabaseService) service;
056               return databaseService.query(query, jsonPath, value.getClass());
057            }, object -> object.equals(value)
058      );
059   }
060
061}
